title: A Little Bit About Me
shortBioLabel: A versatile full stack engineer specializing in frontend engineering. My technical portfolio spans end-to-end application development, integrating modern frontend technologies with Java or Node based backend frameworks and exploring emerging AI technologies through APIs like ChatGPT and Mistral.
description: When I'm not coding or designing interfaces, you'll find me pushing physical limits through endurance running and cycling or strategizing on badminton and tennis courts
